permutations.name: note-TipSkinningTool
permutations.msg: 10 Pound Gorilla's Skinning Tool is both a reference and a tool that customizes the code for DNN theme objects, based on the attribute values you specify.

permutations.name: note-ModuleSecurityForHosts
permutations.msg: To improve security, grant module access only to host users, and disable the module if not used regularly.

permutations.name: note-ModuleSecurityForAdmins
permutations.msg: To improve security, restrict permissions for modules that perform administrative tasks.

permutations.name: note-SecurityReviewLogs
permutations.msg: Review your site's logs regularly to be familiar with your traffic patterns. This practice makes it easier for you to identify unusual patterns that might indicate suspicious activity.

permutations.name: note-DNNContentTypesNoEdit
permutations.msg: Content types provided by DNN cannot be edited. To use a DNN-provided content type as a template for your own content type, you can duplicate it and customize the copy.

permutations.name: note-DNNContentTypesNoDel
permutations.msg: Content types provided by DNN cannot be deleted.

permutations.name: note-DNNVisualizersNoMod
permutations.msg: Visualizers provided by DNN cannot be edited, replaced, exported, or deleted.

permutations.name: note-GlobalSetting
permutations.msg: This setting affects all sites in your installation.

permutations.name: note-RestoredVersion
permutations.msg: The restored version is copied to the top of the list as the most recent version.

permutations.name: note-CloudSupport
permutations.msg: If your Evoq instance is hosted on the DNN Cloud, please contact Evoq Customer Support directly. The following instructions are not applicable to DNN Cloud instances.

permutations.name: note-VisibleToAdminsOnly
permutations.msg: This module is visible to administrators only.
